Hero.title: The ultimate screenwriting workflow platform
Hero.description: Craft your story, scene by scene. Elevate your screenwriting process with our intuitive tools and collaborative features.

characterProfile.title: Character Profile Generator
characterProfile.description: Create detailed character profiles with ease.

storyStructure.title: Story Structure
storyStructure.description: Organize your story with powerful structuring tools.

sceneEditor.title: Scene Editor
sceneEditor.description: Edit and refine your scenes with precision.

aiTools.title: AI-Assisted Tools
aiTools.description: Enhance your writing with AI-powered suggestions.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: ScriptCraft has revolutionized my writing process. The character profile generator is a game-changer!

testimonial2.name: Michael Lee
testimonial2.content: The scene editor in ScriptCraft makes it so easy to visualize and refine each moment of the story.

testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: The AI-assisted tools have helped me overcome writer's block countless times. Highly recommended!

CharacterDesign.title: 角色设计
CharacterDesign.goalPlaceholder: 角色的主要目标是什么？
CharacterDesign.obstaclePlaceholder: 角色面临的主要障碍是什么？

Revision.title: 修改
Revision.sampleText: 这是一个示例段落。这里可能有一些语法错误和表达不清的地方。作者可能想要改进这个段落的结构和用词。
Revision.grammarSuggestion: 第二句话缺少主语，建议添加。
Revision.styleSuggestion: 考虑使用更具体的描述来代替"一些"。
Revision.structureSuggestion: 这个段落可以通过添加一个主题句来增强结构。

StoryStructure.title: 故事结构
StoryStructure.midpointPlaceholder: 中间发生了什么重大事件？
StoryStructure.climaxPlaceholder: 主要冲突如何达到顶点？
StoryStructure.aiSuggestionPlaceholder: 基于你的故事结构，考虑在开场和引发事件之间增加一些日常生活的描述，这将有助于读者更好地理解主角的平常世界。

monsterInTheHouse.name: Monster in the House
monsterInTheHouse.description: A story where characters are trapped with a monster...

goldenFleece.name: Golden Fleece
goldenFleece.description: A quest narrative where characters journey to find a prize...

OneLiner.title: 创建一句话故事
OneLiner.keywordsPlaceholder: 输入关键词，用逗号分隔

MarketResearch.title: 市场调查分析
MarketResearch.storyIdeaPlaceholder: 简要描述你的故事创意
MarketResearch.genres: 科幻,奇幻,悬疑,爱情,冒险
MarketResearch.targetAudienceResult: 18-35岁的年轻读者，对科技和未来世界感兴趣
MarketResearch.marketTrendsResult: 科幻题材持续走热，特别是涉及人工智能和气候变化的主题
MarketResearch.competitiveAnalysisResult: 市场上类似题材的作品不多，有很大发展空间
